definitions.body: hook, ring, fetter;—´[[ח]] abs. Ho 9:6 + 8 t; pl. [[חֲוׇחִים]] 1Sa 13:6 (but v. infr.), [[חוֹחִים]] Ct So 2:2; [[חׂחִים]] 2Ch 33:11; —

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: brier, bramble 2Ki 14:9, 2Ki 14:9 = 2Ch 25:18, 2Ch 25:18 (allegory of Jehoash); coll., sign of desolation Ho 9:6 (‖[[קִמּוֹשׁ]]), Is 34:13 (‖[[קִמּוֹשׁ]], [[סִירִים]]), Job 31:40 (opp. [[חִטִּים]]); in sim. of fool's parable [[עָלָה בְּיַד־שִׁכּוֹר]] ´[[ח]] Pr 26:9 a brier cometh into the hand of a drunken man (De Now Str); [[כְּשׁוֹשַׁנׇּה בֵּין הַחוֹחִים]]; Ct So 2:2; briers = thickets as hiding-places 1Sa 13:6 (but Ew We Dr [[חוֹרִים]] holes, cf. 1Sa 14:11; v. sub III. [[חרר]]; ‖[[מְעָרוֹת]], [[סְלָעִים]], [[חְרִחִים]], [[בּׂרוֹת]]; LXX here e)n t. ma/ndraiv\ 1Sa 14:11 e)k t. trwglw=n.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: hook or ring, in jaw of crocodile c. [[תִּקּׂב]] Job 40:26 (‖[[הֲתָשִׂים אַגְמׂן בְּאַפּוֹ]]); of captive [[וַיִּלְכְּדוּ אֶת־מְנַשֶּׁה בַּחׂחִים]] 2Ch 33:11 (cf. [[חַח]]).
